content: That's a great list of healthy drinks! I think I'll start with the warm lemon water and herbal teas. By the way, I've been taking care of my mom after her gallbladder surgery, and I was wondering if you could give me some tips on how to help her recover at home. She's still experiencing some abdominal pain and nausea, and I want to make sure I'm doing everything I can to support her.
